error.signature: called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: RecvError: receiving on a closed channel

verdict.summary: The sender side of the channel was dropped while the receiver was still waiting. Handle the disconnected case gracefully.

dead_ends.action: Keep the sender alive with a leaked reference to prevent drop
dead_ends.why_fails: Memory leak and the sender will never send meaningful data; just delays the problem

workarounds.action: Handle RecvError properly instead of unwrapping
Use recv_timeout or try_recv for non-blocking patterns

leads_to.condition: When channel errors in async context lead to runtime issues

preceded_by.condition: When Arc holding a sender is prematurely unwrapped

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Broken pipe is an I/O error for OS-level pipes; channel recv disconnected is for in-process mpsc channels
